abstract: Police in Austria, the Czech Republic, France, Hungary, Kosovo, Slovakia and Germany arrest 77 people and accuse them of running smuggling ring that brought people from Kosovo through Serbia and into European Union.
lead_paragraph: The European authorities arrested 77 people accused of running a network smuggling in immigrants from Kosovo to countries in Western Europe.

headline.main: Dozens Arrested in Raids to Stem Illegal Influx of Kosovars
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Police Seek to Halt Kosovo’s Migrants

snippet: The European authorities arrested 77 people accused of running a network smuggling in immigrants from Kosovo to countries in Western Europe.
